CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE assets (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, categoryId INTEGER, value DECIMAL(10,2), quantity INTEGER, acquisitionDate DATE, userId INTEGER, createdAt DATETIME, updatedAt DATETIME, FOREIGN KEY(categoryId) REFERENCES categories(id), FOREIGN KEY(userId) REFERENCES users(id))
SELECT_BY_QUERY: SELECT a.*, c.name as categoryName FROM assets a JOIN categories c ON a.categoryId = c.id WHERE c.name LIKE '%' || $query || '%'
SELECT_BY_USER_ID: SELECT a.*, c.name as categoryName FROM assets a JOIN categories c ON a.categoryId = c.id WHERE a.userId = $user_id
INSERT: INSERT INTO assets (categoryId, value, quantity, acquisitionDate, userId, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ($categoryId, $value, $quantity, $acquisitionDate, $userId, $createdAt, $updatedAt)
UPDATE: UPDATE assets SET categoryId = $categoryId, value = $value, quantity = $quantity, acquisitionDate = $acquisitionDate, updatedAt = $updatedAt WHERE id = $id AND userId = $userId
DELETE: DELETE FROM assets WHERE id = $id AND userId = $userId
